atk-abh03a13:2_2: Tattha khandhādibhāvāvijahanato atītānāgatānaṁ atthitaṁ icchantassa atītaṁ khandhāti pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a13:2_5: tassa niruttipathasuttena atthitāya vāritattā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a13:2_6: Āyatanadhātupucchāsupi anāgatapañhesupi paccuppannena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā anulomapaṭilomato āgatapañhesupi
atk-abh03a13:4_1: Suttasādhane pana na vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a13:4_2: Tattha natthi ceteti natthi ca ete dhammāti attho.
atk-abh03a13:4_3: Khandhādibhāve sati natthitaṁ anicchantassa āmantāti paṭiññā paravādissa,
